Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError is raised when an invalid value is used to set
        the application data of an ApplicationSpecificInformation object.
        """
kwargs = {'application_data': []}
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The application data must be a string.',
    attributes.ApplicationSpecificInformation, **kwargs)
args = attributes.ApplicationSpecificInformation(), 'application_data', []
self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The application data must be a string.',
    setattr, *args)
